params.makerToken: Address of the maker token (what to buy).
params.makerTokenAmounts: Maker token sell amount for each sample.
params.takerToken: Address of the taker token (what to sell).

sampleBuysFromDODO(address,address,uint2.return: takerTokenAmounts Taker amounts sold at each maker token         amount.

params.makerToken: Address of the maker token (what to buy).
params.takerToken: Address of the taker token (what to sell).
params.takerTokenAmounts: Taker token sell amount for each sample.

sampleSellsFromDODO(address,address,uint.return: makerTokenAmounts Maker amounts bought at each taker token         amount.
